name: Seedpod pendants - wearable fibre art soft necklace - screenprinted hemp silk, cotton
description:
A unique statement necklace with tribal bohemian flair - can be dressed up for that art gallery opening or wear casual with a pair of jeans or a summer skirt. Hand dyed and screenprinted natural fiber fabrics finished with a meticulous attention to detail including handmade loops and mother of pearl buttons. My colour combinations are rich and unique because they are created from my own hand dyed fabric palette.

* This unusual bold necklace features three pendants attached to a hemp silk cord with beautiful mother of pearl buttons. Each black cotton pendant has a screenprinted metallic copper or green seedpod. The middle pendant has a 3 dimensional raised frame of hand dyed cinnamon hemp silk to match the cord.
* Pendants have small loops which attach to the necklace with mother of pearl buttons. They can be removed which means that it is possible to have another set of different pendants to switch up (please ask me about this)
* Necklace is made of hand dyed cinnamon hemp silk filled with cotton welt.
* Fastens with a carefully selected vintage mother of pearl button and hand sewn hemp silk loop.
* Measurements: Length of necklace cord is 18 inches around and 7/8" wide. Large pendant measures 3 1/4" in length by 2 1/4" wide. Small pendants are 1 1/2" long by 1" wide.
* This necklace may be washed gently by hand and dried flat.

name: raw silk scarf - rust brown - screenprinted seedpods and silk velvet edges
description:
This luxurious double sided raw silk scarf has been hand dyed and screenprinted in layers of seedpods and a circle and dot pattern. Black silk velvet finishes off the edges at each end

* Rich rust brown raw silk fabric, hand dyed and then discharge screen printed with an organic circle and dot pattern.
* Screenprinted seedpods in black textile paint.
*This beautifully finished scarf is double sided, surface designed on one side only. Other side is hand dyed and edges have been finished with a soft silk velvet fabric.

Measurements: 56" long by 7 1/2" wide. Satin finish at ends measure 3 1/2" long.

Washing Instructions: Wash warm or cold and hang to dry. Raw silk may be ironed at first but with wear and care a soft drape will set in and grow more beautiful with use.

name: Silver clover flower on hand dyed textile purse, zipper pouch
description:
A clip on coin purse made of natural hand dyed and printed cotton linen - inspired by nature and my garden.

This raspberry red and dark grape brush marked purse is made of hand dye painted cotton and linen blend fabric. A screenprint of a clover flower in silver textile paint is on each side of the the purse.

A small brass swivel clip is attached on a black fabric loop so that you can clip this little purse to your belt loop, keyring, bag, jacket zipper or backpack. The zipper is black and the inside lining is black cotton.

Measurements: 4" high by 4 3/4" wide. Attachment to clip is 1 1/2" by 1/2".

name: Screenprinted mountain bear linen zipper pouch, purse
description:
A clip on coin purse made of natural linen and inspired by nature and my life in the mountains.

A sleeping bear in a cozy cave dreams of salmon swimming by. Bears are an important part of mountain life here in the Kootenays of British Columbia. This image speaks to us of dreaming, birthing and wholeness.

This purse is made of 100% natural linen and has been screenprinted with a sleeping bear in black textile paint. 
A small brass swivel clip is attached on a loop so that you can clip this little purse to your belt loop, keyring, bag, jacket zipper or backpack.

Measurements: 4 1/2" high by 4" wide. Attachment to clip is 2" by 1/2". 

PLEASE NOTE: Colour of zipper and inner lining may vary slightly from the one showed in the photo.

name: Poppy Pod fiber art soft jewelry necklace
description:
Unique soft textile art necklace with a screenprinted metallic green poppyhead design. Warm earthy colours and natural fiber fabrics finished with a meticulous attention to detail including a handmade loop and mother of pearl button for fastening. My colour combinations are rich and unique because they are created from my own hand dyed fabric palette.

* This whimsical design of a poppyhead comes from my original pen and ink drawing of the poppies in my fall garden. Screenprinted in metallic green textile paint on black linen fabric. Framed with the selvedegd edge of dyed and screenprinted striped cotton muslin.
* Pendant hangs with handmade and dyed hemp silk loops threaded on a dyed hemp silk cord made especially to suit the pendant
* Silk cord (3/8"diameter)is a cinnamon brown hemp silk filled with a 100% cotton.
* Fastens with a carefully selected vintage mother of pearl button and hand sewn hemp silk loop.
* Measurements: Length of necklace cord is 19 1/2 inches around. Pendant measures 4 inches by 2 inches.
* This necklace may be washed gently by hand and dried flat.

name: Seedpod wearable art soft jewelry necklace
description:
Unique soft textile art necklace with a tribal bohemian style. Hand dyed and screenprinted natural fiber fabrics finished with a meticulous attention to detail including a handmade loops and mother of pearl buttons. My colour combinations are rich and unique because they are created from my own hand dyed fabric palette.

* An unusual bold necklace features three pendants attached to a textured cord with beautiful mother of pearl buttons. Each pendant has a screenprinted metallic copper or gold seedpod layered over a screenprinted seed motif.
* Pendants are made of linen rayon and filled with felted wool for stability. They have small loops which attach to the necklace with mother of pearl buttons. They can be removed which means that it is possible to have another set of different pendants to switch up (please ask me about this)
* Choker style necklace is made of hand dyed blue linen rayon and has the selvedged edges showing to create beautiful textured edges.
* Fastens with a carefully selected vintage mother of pearl button and hand sewn hemp silk loop.
* Measurements: Length of necklace cord is 17 inches around and 7/8" wide. Each pendant measures 2" in length by 1 1/4" wide.
* This necklace may be washed gently by hand and dried flat.

name: Butterfly in itajime triangle - coin purse, zipper pouch
description:
The delicate and beautiful butterfly reminds us that nature can be fragile and deserves our care and respect. Triangles are symbols of harmony and balance.

This little purse is made of 100% cotton and has been hand dyed a light ochre brown with a green triangle and back of purse. Itajime is a shibori technique which creates patterns and motifs using clamped blocks to resist the dye.
A butterfly has been screenprinted into the triangle with black textile paint. The zipper opens to a hand dyed green cotton lining.

A small brass swivel clip is attached on a loop so that you can clip this little purse to your belt loop, keyring, bag, jacket zipper or backpack.

Measurements: 5" high by 4 1/2" wide. Attachment to clip is 2" by 1/2".

name: Raw silk scarf - purple and copper- screenprinted leaves and stripes
description:
This luxurious double sided raw silk scarf has been hand dyed and screenprinted in layers of leaves and organic stripes. A light copper hemp silk satin with a beautiful sheen finishes the edges.

*Grape purple silk fabric, hand dyed and then discharge screen printed with an organically rendered stripe pattern in a paler dusty pink/purple.
* Screenprinted leaves in metallic copper textile paint.
*This beautifully finished scarf is double sided, surface designed on one side only. Other side is hand dyed and edges have been finished with a rich shiny hemp silk fabric.

Measurements: 57" long by 7 1/2" wide. Satin finish at ends measure 3 1/2" long.

Washing Instructions: Wash warm or cold and hang to dry. May be ironed at first but with wear and care a soft drape will set in and grow more beautiful with use

For info on shipping please go to the SHIPPING and POLICIES tab

name: Silver Clover shoulder bag - hand dyed cerise
description:
This cerise and dark grape brush marked shoulder bag is made of hand dye painted cotton and linen blend fabric. Screenprinted clover flowers are in silver textile paint.

DETAILS:

* The bag and straps are made of hand dye painted cotton linen. The lining is hand dyed dusty pink cotton.

* There is a zipper opening into the whole bag with a small zipper opening at the bag into a pouch measuring 4" wide by 3 1/2" long.

* Bag measurements: 8" high by 6 1/2" wide.The clip-on strap on the bag is adjustable in length and is 1" wide.

* All metal hardware is brass in colour.

For info on shipping please go to the SHIPPING and POLICIES tab.

name: Raw silk scarf - copper and chartreuse - screenprinted leaves and stripes
description:
This luxurious double sided raw silk scarf has been hand dyed and screenprinted in layers of leaves and organic stripes. A light copper hemp silk satin with a beautiful sheen finishes the edges.

* Lime lichen green silk fabric, hand dyed and then discharge screen printed with an organically rendered stripe pattern in a pale yellow.
* Screenprinted leaves in metallic copper textile paint.
*This beautifully finished scarf is double sided, surface designed on one side only. Other side is hand dyed and edges have been finished with a rich shiny hemp silk fabric.

Measurements: 50" long by 7 1/2" wide. Satin finish at ends measure 3 1/2" long.

Washing Instructions: Wash warm or cold and hang to dry. May be ironed at first but with wear and care a soft drape will set in and grow more beautiful with use

For info on shipping please go to the SHIPPING and POLICIES tab.

name: Shoulder bag with coin purse - Buzzy Bee design
description:
Surface designed rust orange on dark khaki shoulder bag has layers of screenprinted bubbles and buzzy little bees. My textile designs are inspired by nature, my garden and the beautiful Kootenay environment I live in. Bees are some of my favourite creatures and we keep two hives in our garden amongst the flowers, vegetables, herbs and raspberries. They feature often in my work.

DETAILS:

* The bag, lining and straps are made of a dark khaki cotton twill, almost a light canvas weight. The small coin purse and textile art feature are made from hand dyed cotton in beautiful rust and soft greens.

* Bees in black textile paint and bubble design in dark grape have been screeprinted by hand in layers. Bees have also been printed lightly  in a pearly white to create a movement or ghosting pattern.

* There is a zipper opening into the whole bag with a small zipper opening at the bag into a pouch measuring 4" wide by 3 1/2" long.

* Bag measurements:  8" high by 6 1/2" wide. Coin purse is 4" by 3" and clips onto the bag. The clip-on strap on the bag is adjustable in length and is 1" wide. 

* Zippers are rust brown, metal hardware is brass in colour.

For info on shipping please go to the SHIPPING and POLICIES tab.
